Hi, I’m Manuel. As a freelance facilitator, I accompany organizations towards a more cooperative working-together.

Let me help you out!

How I can help you

  • Facilitation.
  • Rethink gouvernance. Help you organise for. Mettre en place. Practical guidance for self-organising teams (dus meer uit perspectief ‘je bent het wss al’ dan ‘ik kom het eens uitleggen’.
  • Organising for technical challenges
  • A la carte.

Help you organise for. Mettre en place. Practical guidance for self-organising teams (dus meer uit perspectief ‘je bent het wss al’ dan ‘ik kom het eens uitleggen’.

About me? I was born in 1989 and live in Belgium, waar ik taalmopjes maak in’t Nederlands et où je complimente des inconnus en rue en français. I studied Engineering Physics at Ghent university and was a PhD student at the UGent Department of Geography for three years. I worked at the International Peace Information Service as a GIS officer and data scientist for three years. Then I joined the social-purpose worker cooperative Coop IT Easy as a software engineer for one and a half years. I also did some freelance work for some of the projects listed on this website - most notably for Agora redoing the website and running the online participation platform.

You can reach me at manuel.claeys.b@gmail.com.
